hero.subtitle: M&A advisory for SMEs and mid-caps. Valuation €5M-€50M. Sell-side, buy-side, fundraising.

provider.paragraph1: Your strategic decisions require more than simple support. At alecia, we stand by your side at every stage, with the same determination as an entrepreneur invested in their own success.
provider.paragraph2: Your transactions are handled with care by dedicated partners who orchestrate the construction of key information, identify buyers, investors or lenders, and coordinate all advisors involved.

expertises.title: Our expertise
expertises.subtitle: Your projects deserve more than standard advice. With deep experience in financial transactions and operations.

cession.title: Divestiture & Succession
cession.description: Selling your business is a decisive moment that requires flawless preparation and execution.

fundraising.title: Fundraising & Financing
fundraising.description: Whether to finance your growth or restructure your capital, we support you.

acquisition.title: Acquisition
acquisition.description: Acquiring a company is a major strategic lever to accelerate growth.

regional.subtitle: Our multi-regional presence and entrepreneurial backgrounds enable us to understand the challenges and daily reality of business leaders.

valuation.description: Get a free initial estimate based on your sector multiples. Our tool uses comparable transaction data to give you an order of magnitude.

cta.subtitle: Contact one of our partners for an initial confidential discussion.

operations.title: Transactions
operations.subtitle: Discover a selection of transactions led by our partners and directors

team.title: Our team
team.subtitle: The variety of our backgrounds and expertise is alecia's strength
team.hiringSubtitle: Join a dynamic team and participate in exciting transactions.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Are you a business owner, shareholder, or investor? Contact us for more information.
